episodes.synopsis: Colombian presidential candidate Ingrid Betancourt is kidnapped by guerrilla rebels, and she and other hostages must endure terrifying conditions.
episodes.title: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Ingrid realizes she's part of a group of important political hostages, the army devises a rescue plan under the guise of a humanitarian mission.
episodes.title: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Tensions run high as the guerrillas finally meet with the humanitarian mission, and the hostages embark on a daring escape attempt.
episodes.title: Part 3

video.title: Operación Jaque
video.synopsis: This miniseries dramatizes the military operation that freed Colombian political activist Ingrid Betancourt and others held hostage by FARC guerillas.
